General.Name: Shenzhen SC New Energy Technology Corp Class A
General.Description: Shenzhen S.C New Energy Technology Corporation engages in research, development, manufacturing, and sale of crystalline silicon solar cell equipment. It offers wet equipment, tube equipment, plate equipment, laser equipment, metallization equipment, and intelligent manufacturing equipment series, as well as crystalline silicon battery solutions. Shenzhen S.C New Energy Technology Corporation was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: No.62 Jinniu East Road, Shenzhen, China
